did.head: Collection Summary
did.abstract: Holograph and typewritten manuscript of single issue campus newsletter, April 29 to May 6, 1901. Elbert J. Hollingshead, editor, Courtland F. Day, assistant editor, Norman J. Roberts, correspondent, and other contributors.

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: There are no restrictions on this collection.

prefercite.head: Credit Line
prefercite.p: The Fourth-Preparatory Herald (Tucson, Ariz.) (AZ 239). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Campus newsletter prepared by University of Arizona students, circa April 29, 1901-May 6, 1901.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Holograph and typewritten manuscript of single issue campus newsletter, April 29 to May 6, 1901. Elbert J. Hollingshead, editor, Courtland F. Day, assistant editor, Norman J. Roberts, correspondent, and other contributors.
